channel.description: well i need help with my compiler and runserver whenever i run them they run but they dont do anything it says nothing and it doesnt run the server and it doesnt compiler i have mod tharoks perfect compiler but it still doesnt compiler and run can someone help me?

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Ruzuronni Ruzuronni
item.description:
@Ruzuronni wrote:

Delete the stuff in compile.bat and put this in [code]@ECHO OFf

REM ---------------------------------------------------
REM Made By Lamez, Please to not edit or copy any
REM thing without permission from Lamez (James Little)
REM Please Visit http://krazyscape.lamezz.com
REM ---------------------------------------------------
REM This will Compile and Run your server at option
REM ---------------------------------------------------

:start
color a
cls
TITLE Do You Want To Compile? - Made By Lamez
ECHO [Y]es or [N]o
ECHO.
SET/p do=Do You Want To Compile Before Run?:^>

if “%do%” equ “y” goto comp
if “%do%” equ “Y” goto comp
if “%do%” equ “n” goto server
if “%do%” equ “N” goto server
if “%do%” equ “” goto error

ECHO.

:error
color c
cls
ECHO.
title ERROR! - Made By Lamez
ECHO %do%, is not a command!
ECHO.
ECHO Please Enter: Y or N
ECHO.
ECHO Press Any Key To Continue!
PAUSE>NUL
GOTO start

:comp
cls
ECHO.
TITLE Compiler - Made By Lamez
color a
“%homedirve%\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“%homedirve%\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe” server

pause

:server
Title Running Server - Made By Lamez
cls
java -Xmx1024m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545
pause
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Try these.

@echo off color 0c title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" *.java pause

@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
